ComicInfo.Title: Mudslinging; The Substitute Cinderella; The Mermaid Gig
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hildago Romero is slandering the Femforce on his television show, but General Gordon refuses to let the Femforce members go on the show to defend themselves. Not being a Femforce member, Miss Masque decides to go on the show to defend them. However, Romero has set up the show so that it quickly turns into a mud wrestling contest between Miss Masque and Madame Boa.
Ginge is thinking about attending the circus in town when a lion comes into the diner. She trys to run away and hide in an airplane but the lion follows her. It turns out that she is stuck in the middle of two gangs fighting and one of the gangs use the lion's attraction to her in the fight.
Agent Decker pretends to be Joan's father to get her inside a gang of crooks that are swindling young women out of their money by posing as talent scouts.
Chloe Tristram is being accused of several crimes by eye witnesses, but she insists she is innocent. The break in the case comes when Chloe tells Sandra that she has an identical twin sister.
Ed has a theory that a mermaid can swim faster than any human. To prove it, he makes a mermaid tail for Torchy. When a fishing line catches on her suit, the fisherman thinks he's caught a real mermaid.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 22:38:20. [CVDB36207] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:34:46. [Issue ID 51837]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Ward,John Alton,Mark Heike,Matt Baker,Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Inker: Bill Ward,John Alton,Mark Heike,Matt Baker,Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Characters: Avenger [Roger Wright],General Gordon,Tara Fremont,She-Cat,Miss Masque [Diana Adams],Madame Boa [Amanda Bovier],Stardust,Buckaroo Betty,Hildago Romero
